entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
